Class GameWorld

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.World
GameWorld
public class GameWorld extends greenfoot.World
GameWorld is a room-to-room battle game.

    • tryMove

      public void tryMove(int dr, int dc)
      try to move to an adjacent room. if current room cleared, can move to any neighbor room. if not cleared, can only move back to the last room.
      Parameters:
      dr - :change in room row
      dc - : change in room col

    • isRoomUnlocked

      public boolean isRoomUnlocked()
      Returns:
      true non-combat room or when enemy count=0
